html-css-basics.title: HTML & CSS Basics
html-css-basics.summary: Structure and style pages using HTML5 and CSS3.
html-css-basics.content:
Learn how to use HTML to structure content and CSS to style it. These are core front-end technologies.

<h1>Hello World</h1>
h1 { color: blue; }

js-functions.title: JavaScript Functions
js-functions.summary: Use reusable logic blocks to write efficient code.
js-functions.content:
Functions are reusable blocks of logic. They allow you to break code into components.

function greet(name) {
  return "Hello " + name;
}

node-express-api.title: Node.js & Express
node-express-api.summary: Build a backend using REST endpoints and middleware.
node-express-api.content:
Express simplifies backend API creation. It handles routing and middleware logic.

app.get('/hello', (req, res) => {
  res.send('Hello World');
});
